sentences.english: Cunard Line continues to provide the classy elegance we are accustomed to seeing from them.
sentences.chinese: 丘納德線繼續提供經典優雅我們習慣於看到他們。

sentences.english: He picked up a piece of flowers in his hand and he danced elegantly.
sentences.chinese: 他拿起一朵花放在手上然後就優雅地跳舞。

sentences.english: A group of elegant young gentlemen were sauntering in the park.
sentences.chinese: 一羣優雅的年輕紳士在花園裏悠閒地漫步。

sentences.english: A school of spotted eagle rays glides gracefully through the island-speckled waters of the Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 一羣斑點鷹魟姿態優雅的掠過馬爾代夫羣島水域。

sentences.english: He had many elegancies of his own, whilst he scoffed at conventional elegance.
sentences.chinese: 他本人便具備很多優雅，儘管他在譏笑常規的優雅。

sentences.english: He had many elegancies of his own, whilst he scoffed at conventional elegance.
sentences.chinese: 他本人便具備很多優雅，儘管他在譏笑常規的優雅。

sentences.english: Palomar. This is a witty, elegant, fantastic tale.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個機智，優雅，充滿幻想的故事。

sentences.english: The hotel has been redecorated, but it lost a lot of it's style.
sentences.chinese: 旅館已重新裝修，但昔日優雅格調所剩不多。

sentences.english: Cavorting pairs bow gracefully to each other.
sentences.chinese: 跳躍的伴侶，優雅地相互鞠躬。

sentences.english: Multicolor Louis Vuitton bags Greta is a classic and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 會標多色的的路易威登袋格里塔是一個古典和優雅。

sentences.english: He is all flourishes, rococo gestures, and exquisite manners.
sentences.chinese: 他手舞足蹈，優雅地比劃着繁雜的手勢。

sentences.english: The meaning of the sapphire is elegant pure beauty, romantic and sincere happiness.
sentences.chinese: 寶藍色的含義是優雅純潔的美，浪漫真摯的幸福。

sentences.english: A protruding collarbone and a long, elegant neck were also the focus of secondary erogenous zones in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，突出的鎖骨和修長優雅的頸項也是性感區域。

sentences.english: Rather than flashily smash against the wall, why not elegantly turn a corner? Give yourself the space to make a turnaround.
sentences.chinese: 要華麗撞牆不如優雅轉身，給自己一個迂迴的空間。

sentences.english: Perfect scale, define your official elegance.
sentences.chinese: 完美尺度，定義貴仕優雅格調。

sentences.english: The neck should be raised and gracefully arched, with the poll as the highest point.
sentences.chinese: 馬的頸部應當優雅的弓彎擡高，項部位於最高點。
